nodes.text: #TEDatBCG Important convo happening at @LinkedIn @BCG Kedra Newsom Reeves, Wealth equity strategist, Managing Director and Partner, BCG in Chicago; Topic: how to stop the expansion of the racial wealth gap in the US\nhttps://t.co/eUWQPD9DZN
How to close the wealth gap between Black and white Americans.\n1⃣ Build awareness in the Black community that there are free-fee checking accounts in banking institutions, e.g. credit unions.
